overview: LiveHelpIndia.com is a leading provider of dedicated, offshore Staffs for Inbound Call Center Outsourcing, Virtual Assistant Services, Customer Sales & Support Outsourcing, 24 Hour Helpdesk and Search Engine Marketing etc. Having facilities in USA, UK and Indore India. We are providing virtual assistant, call center outsourcing services since year 2002. All the LHI’s Service Facilities are Managed by Its America based management team. Hire part/full time dedicated employees with various skillsets for all kind of Call Center, back office business process outsourcing Services,
